name: Necuratu
description:
The raw version is available!


Current controls:
A,W,S,D and the mouse controls the view.
Press the H key to change mouse control to select actions.
Press the I key to open up the build options.
Press T to turn the tips screen on, press Y to turn it off.
Press M to toggle the music off, press P to turn it back on again.

The three icons on the action bar:
1 - Opens the spellbook menu.
2 - Flee to the base coffin.
3 - Bite to turn a human into a vampire.

The buildings currently available, but in development:
1 - Extra base coffin - gives some protection for a vampire.
2 - Thick coffin - gives some protection for a vampire.
3 - Blood storage - rapidly heals units nearby.
4 - Aswang Hut - construable but not functional yet.

Avoid the sun, it will kill your vampires. If the leader dies, it's game over.


The goal of in the raw version is just to get to the town 'Lasmere' next to the graveyard. Warning, this game is in development and might be full of glitches, and a ton of features are yet to be implemented.


Updates to come:

Controls
Abilities
Spells
Units
Buildings
Story
Factions
